description: Display Elasticsearch key metrics from Telegraf

panels.description: On the shard level, a red status indicates that the specific shard is not allocated in the cluster, yellow means that the primary shard is allocated but replicas are not, and green means that all shards are allocated. The index level status is controlled by the worst shard status. The cluster status is controlled by the worst index status.
panels.title: Cluster Status

panels.description: On the shard level, a red status indicates that the specific shard is not allocated in the cluster, yellow means that the primary shard is allocated but replicas are not, and green means that all shards are allocated. The index level status is controlled by the worst shard status. The cluster status is controlled by the worst index status.
panels.title: Cluster Status Histogram

panels.description: Instances running Elasticsearch in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s)
panels.title: Nodes

panels.description: Data nodes hold data and perform data related operations such as CRUD, search, and aggregations in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s)
panels.title: Data Nodes

panels.description: Number of metadata changes that occur faster than ${cluster:csv} cluster(s) master node process
panels.title: Pending Tasks

panels.description: Number of shards (primary and replicas) in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s) open indices
panels.title: Active Shards

panels.description: Number of primary shards in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s) open indices
panels.title: Active Primary Shards

panels.description: Number of just created shards in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s)
panels.title: Initializing Shards

panels.description: Number of shards in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s) that are currently moving from one node to other
panels.title: Relocating Shards

panels.description: Number of shards in ${cluster:csv} cluster(s) that not assigned to node
panels.title: Unassigned Shards

panels.description: CPU usage for the whole system
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Percentage of used memory
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Percentage of used disk
panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description: Number of opened file descriptors associated with the current process
panels.title: Open File Descriptors

panels.description: Amount of data received in cluster communication
panels.title: Received Data

panels.description: Number of HTTP connections currently open
panels.title: HTTP Connections Rate

panels.description: Amount of data sent in cluster communication
panels.title: Sent Data

panels.description: Number of documents currently being indexed to an index
panels.title: Documents Indexing Rate

panels.description: Documents index to an index latency
panels.title: Indexing Latency

panels.description: Number of searches on primary shards
panels.title: Search Rate

panels.description: Latency on querying primary shard
panels.title: Search Latency

panels.description: Number of documents in the ${cluster:csv} cluster(s)
panels.title: Documents Count (with replicas)

panels.description: Number of documents deleted
panels.title: Documents Deleting Rate

panels.description: Number of documents currently being merged
panels.title: Documents Merging Rate

panels.description: Size of fielddata cache
panels.title: Field Data Memory Size

panels.description: Number of evictions from the fielddata cache
panels.title: Field Data Evictions

panels.description: Memory used by query cache
panels.title: Query Cache Size

panels.description: Rate of query cache evictions
panels.title: Query Cache Evictions Rate

panels.description: Rate of query cache hits
panels.title: Query Cache Hits Rate

panels.description: Rate of query cache misses
panels.title: Query Cache Misses Rate

panels.description: Time indexing waited due throttling
panels.title: Indexing Throttling

panels.description: Time recovery waited due throttling
panels.title: Recovery Throttling

panels.description: Amount of memory used by JVM heap
panels.title: Heap Used

panels.description: Number of active threads in JVM
panels.title: JVM Threads

panels.description: Number of major GCs that collect old generation objects and number of minor GCs that collects young generation objects in JVM
panels.title: GC Count

panels.description: Time spent on major GCs that collect old generation objects and on minor GCs that collects young generation objects in JVM
panels.title: GC Time

title: Elasticsearch
